name: Bald Eagle
description: The bald eagle is a powerful bird of prey known for its white head and tail feathers.

name: Peacock
description: The peacock is a large and colorful bird known for its extravagant tail feathers.

name: Hornbill
description: Hornbills are medium-sized birds known for their large, curved bills.

name: Hummingbird
description: Hummingbirds are small, colorful birds known for their rapid wing beats and hovering abilities.

name: Penguin
description: Penguins are flightless birds known for their distinctive black and white plumage.

name: Toucan
description: Toucans are brightly colored birds known for their large, colorful bills.

name: Albatross
description: Albatrosses are large seabirds known for their long wingspans and impressive gliding abilities.

name: Flamingo
description: Flamingos are large wading birds known for their vibrant pink plumage and distinctive hooked bills.

name: Ostrich
description: Ostriches are flightless birds known for being the largest and fastest birds on land.

name: Snowy Owl
description: Snowy owls are large, white owls known for their excellent hunting skills in snowy environments.

name: Toucanet
description: Toucanets are small, colorful birds related to toucans and known for their vibrant plumage.

name: Kingfisher
description: Kingfishers are small to medium-sized birds known for their brightly colored plumage and impressive diving and fishing skills.

name: Puffin
description: Puffins are small seabirds known for their distinctive appearance with colorful beaks and bright plumage.

name: Blue Jay
description: The blue jay is a strikingly beautiful bird with its blue and white plumage, known for its intelligence and raucous calls.

name: Bald Eagle
description: Bald eagles are large raptors known for their distinctive white head and tail feathers and powerful hunting abilities.

name: Woodpecker
description: Woodpeckers are medium-sized birds known for their strong beaks and drumming behavior on trees to find insects.

name: Emu
description: The emu is the second-largest bird in the world and is known for its long neck, strong legs, and fast running speed.

name: Resplendent Quetzal
description: The resplendent quetzal is a magnificent and sacred bird known for its brilliant green and red plumage.

name: Black-browed Albatross
description: The Black-browed albatross is a large seabird with distinct black markings on its face and wings.

name: Swallow-tailed Toucan
description: The swallow-tailed toucan is a colorful bird with a large and vibrant bill, known for its graceful flight and acrobatic skills.

name: Swan
description: Swans are elegant and graceful birds known for their long necks and beautiful swimming movements.

name: Belted Kingfisher
description: The belted kingfisher is a medium-sized bird known for its diving hunting technique and distinct blue and white plumage.

name: Horned Puffin
description: The horned puffin is a seabird known for its distinctive bright beak and unique horn-like projections above its eyes.

name: Roseate Spoonbill
description: The roseate spoonbill is a beautiful wading bird known for its pink plumage and distinct spoon-shaped bill.

name: Eagle
description: Eagles are large and powerful birds of prey known for their keen eyesight and strong hunting skills.

name: Rainbow Lorikeet
place_of_found: Australia, Eastern Indonesia, Papua New Guinea
description: The rainbow lorikeet is a colorful and playful parrot species native to Australia and nearby regions.

name: Channel-billed Toucan
description: The channel-billed toucan is a large and colorful bird with a distinctive yellow-orange bill and is known for its loud vocalizations.

name: Cassowary
place_of_found: Australia, New Guinea, and nearby islands
description: The cassowary is a large, flightless bird known for its vibrant coloration, helmet-like casque, and powerful legs.

name: Pigeon
description: Pigeons are common birds found in urban areas known for their ability to navigate long distances.

name: Golden Pheasant
description: The golden pheasant is a colorful and exotic bird known for its striking plumage and elegant appearance.

name: Swan
description: Swans are elegant water birds known for their long necks and graceful swimming.

name: Harpy Eagle
description: The harpy eagle is a powerful and majestic bird of prey found in the dense tropical rainforests.

name: Laysan Albatross
description: The Laysan albatross is a seabird known for its graceful gliding and long-distance flights across the ocean.

name: Eagle
description: Eagles are powerful birds of prey known for their keen eyesight and soaring flight.

name: Emerald Toucanet
description: The emerald toucanet is a small and colorful bird known for its bright green plumage and distinctive large beak.

name: Kookaburra
description: Kookaburras are iconic Australian birds known for their loud, laughing calls.

name: Crowned Crane
description: The crowned crane is a majestic bird known for its elegant appearance and dance-like courtship displays.

name: Emperor Penguin
description: The emperor penguin is the largest and tallest of all penguin species, known for its remarkable ability to survive in the harsh Antarctic environment.

name: Parrot
place_of_found: Central and South America, Africa, Asia, Oceania
description: Parrots are colorful birds known for their ability to mimic human speech and sounds.

name: Rhea
diet: Omnivore (mainly plants, insects, and small vertebrates)
description: The rhea is a large, flightless bird native to South America, and it is known for its fast running speed and strong legs.

name: Pelican
description: Pelicans are large water birds known for their long beaks and pouches for catching fish.

name: Golden Eagle
description: The golden eagle is a large bird of prey known for its powerful talons and keen eyesight.

name: Wandering Albatross
description: The wandering albatross is one of the largest seabirds with an impressive wingspan and is known for its remarkable flying abilities.

name: Eagle
description: Eagles are large birds of prey known for their powerful beaks and keen eyesight.

name: Woodpecker
description: Woodpeckers are birds with strong beaks used for drilling holes into trees in search of insects.

name: Atlantic Puffin
description: The Atlantic puffin is a small seabird known for its distinctive black and white plumage and colorful beak.

name: Cockatoo
description: Cockatoos are large parrots with a distinctive crest on top of their heads and are known for their vocal abilities.

name: Keel-billed Toucan
description: The keel-billed toucan is a colorful bird with a large and vibrant bill, known for its playful and social behavior.

name: Common Kestrel
description: The common kestrel is a small falcon known for its hovering hunting technique and striking plumage.

name: Snowy Owl
description: Snowy Owls are large white owls with a rounded head and yellow eyes, well adapted to their cold habitats.
